name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience, specializing in delivering high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **JavaScript**, with hands-on experience in backend development using **RESTful APIs**, **gRPC**, and databases like **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **Neo4j**. Skilled in implementing **CI/CD** practices and deploying applications in **Kubernetes** environments. Strong advocate of clean coding and automation practices, ensuring robust and maintainable codebases.

Bringing expertise in frontend technologies including **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**, alongside a solid foundation in backend frameworks such as **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms supporting predictive analytics and automation while adhering to compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. Adept in MLOps practices, including orchestration and model training using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. A strong collaborator with excellent problem-solving skills, dedicated to delivering exceptional software development solutions.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed robust **RESTful APIs** and microservices architectures utilizing **gRPC** and **Kubernetes** to ensure seamless communication and scalability across applications.
• Engineered CI/CD pipelines employing automation best practices, significantly enhancing deployment efficiency and reducing time to market by **30%** using **GitHub Actions** and **CircleCI**.
• Designed and maintained complex databases with **PostgreSQL** and **MySQL**, ensuring high availability and performance for data-driven applications in various domains.
• Implemented clean coding principles and automation practices, facilitating code quality and collaboration across the team, resulting in a **25%** decrease in bugs reported post-deployment.
• Solved complex problems by integrating third-party services and libraries, enhancing functionality and user experience without compromising performance.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams, ensuring clear communication and alignment on project objectives, which led to timely project completions and operational efficiency.
• Delivered high-quality front-end experiences leveraging **JavaScript** frameworks like React, leading to improved user engagement metrics by over **15%**.
• Participated in code reviews and mentoring sessions, fostering a culture of knowledge sharing and continuous improvement within the engineering team.

Utilized **JavaScript** for all front-end development and created efficient, maintainable **RESTful APIs** for seamless integration between services.
Leveraged **gRPC** to enhance inter-service communication, significantly improving the speed and efficiency of data transfer across microservices.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines to streamline deployment processes, enhancing code quality through automated testing and deployment on **Kubernetes**.
Designed relational databases using **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **Neo4j**, ensuring robust data storage and retrieval mechanisms to support financial applications.
Modernized core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Built interactive front-end applications with **React** (18), **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, utilizing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
Delivered real-time analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies, handling over **1 million** data points.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance, resulting in a **30%** reduction in processing time.
Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing with the ability to process data sets exceeding **10 TB**.
Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns, which reduced fraud instances by **25%**.
Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services.

Leveraged **JavaScript** frameworks (React 18, Vue 3, Angular) to build responsive and SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs, ensuring mobile-first engagement and compliance with accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1).
Designed and implemented **RESTful APIs** to facilitate secure communication between frontend and backend services, optimizing data retrieval and application performance.
Utilized **PostgreSQL** and **MySQL** for robust data storage solutions, maintaining high availability and ensuring data integrity across diverse e-commerce workflows.
Implemented **gRPC** for efficient, high-performance service-to-service communication, enhancing the scalability of various backend components in a microservices architecture.
Collaborated on establishing **CI/CD** pipelines for seamless deployment processes, improving code delivery speed and minimizing downtime during updates.
Introduced **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, utilizing automated deployments and scaling strategies to maintain service reliability and manage infrastructure efficiently.
Practiced clean coding standards and effective automation practices to enhance code maintainability, reducing technical debt and improving team collaboration.
Actively participated in problem-solving workshops to address complex technical challenges, driving innovative solutions that increased system performance by **20%**.
Engaged in collaborative development processes with cross-functional teams to ensure alignment on project goals and deliverables, enhancing overall team productivity.
Utilized **Neo4j** for managing intricate data relationships, providing insights into customer behaviors and preferences, and enabling personalized user experiences.
